recipe.name: Oatmeal Toasting & Sandwitch Bread
recipe.notes: Purchased at the now defunct Ralph's.You must all now feel sad about this.  SAD! You bastards!!An interesting sounding recipe.
recipe.preparation: Mix together all ingredients to create a shaggy dough.  Knead by hand 10 minutes or 45 minutes by machine until smooth.Put dough in a lightly greased bowl and allow to rest 1 hour, until not quight double.Proofing: Shape as cylinder and place in 9x5" pan and cover with greased plastic rap and allow to rise 45-60 minutes until crested 1-2 inches over the rim of the pam.Bake at 350F for 35-45 minutes.  They say the center will reach 190F, but we'll never know.
recipe.source_name: King Arthur Flour Unbleached Bread Flour package
